languages.text: {n}Техножрец осеняет себя защитным символом, его рука отчетливо дрожит.{/n} "Защити нас Бог-Машина от зла, поразившего своды твоего храма. Спаси и сохрани от порчи, укажи путь..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Техножрец осеняет себя защитным символом, его рука отчетливо дрожит.{/n} "Защити нас Бог-Машина от зла, поразившего своды твоего храма. Спаси и сохрани от порчи, укажи путь..."

languages.text: {n}The Tech-Priest blesses himself with a protective symbol, his hand visibly shaking.{/n} "Shield us, O Machine God, from the evil that has taken hold of your temple. Save us, preserve us from the corruption, show us the way..."
languages.original_text: {n}Техножрец осеняет себя защитным символом, его рука отчетливо дрожит.{/n} "Защити нас Бог-Машина от зла, поразившего своды твоего храма. Спаси и сохрани от порчи, укажи путь..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The Tech-Priest blesses himself with his protective symbol, his hand visibly shaking.{/n} "Shield us, O Machine God, from the evil that has taken your temple. Save us, preserve us from the taint, show us the way..."

{n}The Tech-Priest blesses himself with his protective symbol, his hand visibly shaking.{/n} "Shield us, O Machine God, from the evil that has taken your temple. Save us, preserve us from the taint, show us the way..."

{n}The Tech-Priest blesses himself with a protective symbol, his hand visibly shaking.{/n} "Shield us, O Machine God, from the evil that has taken hold of your temple. Save us, preserve us from the corruption, show us the way..."

{n}The Tech-Priest blesses himself with a protective symbol, his hand visibly shaking.{/n} "Shield us, O Machine God, from the evil that has taken hold of your temple. Save us, preserve us from the corruption, show us the way..."

languages.text: {n}技术神甫为自己画了个保护性的印记，他的手明显在颤抖着。{/n}“噢，万机之神啊，保护我们免受这座神殿中邪恶之物的影响。拯救我们吧，让我们远离腐化，为我们指明前进的方向……”
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest blesses himself with a protective symbol, his hand visibly shaking.{/n} "Shield us, O Machine God, from the evil that has taken hold of your temple. Save us, preserve us from the corruption, show us the way..."

traits.locale_text: {n}技术祭司为自己画了个保护性的印记，他的手明显在颤抖着。{/n}“噢，万机之神啊，保护我们免受这座神殿中邪恶之物的影响。拯救我们吧，让我们远离腐化，为我们指明前进的方向……”

languages.text: {n}El tecnosacerdote se bendice usando un símbolo protector con mano temblorosa.{/n} «Protégenos, oh, Dios Máquina, del mal que ahora mora en tu templo. Sálvanos, guárdanos de la corrupción y muéstranos el camino...».
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest blesses himself with a protective symbol, his hand visibly shaking.{/n} "Shield us, O Machine God, from the evil that has taken hold of your temple. Save us, preserve us from the corruption, show us the way..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El tecnosacerdote se bendice usando un símbolo protector con mano temblorosa.{/n} «Protégenos, oh, Dios Máquina, del mal que ahora mora en tu templo. Sálvanos, guárdanos de la corrupción y muéstranos el camino...».

languages.text: {n}技術司祭は守りのシンボルで自身を祝福する。その手は震えていた。{/n}「機械神よ、あなたの祠を手中に収める悪党からお守りください。救済と腐敗からの庇護をいただき、行くべき道を示してくれたまえ…」
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest blesses himself with a protective symbol, his hand visibly shaking.{/n} "Shield us, O Machine God, from the evil that has taken hold of your temple. Save us, preserve us from the corruption, show us the way..."

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭は守りのシンボルで自身を祝福する。その手は震えていた。{/n}「機械神よ、あなたの祠を手中に収める悪党からお守りください。救済と腐敗からの庇護をいただき、行くべき道を示してくれたまえ…」

languages.text: {n}Der Techpriester segnet sich selbst mit einem Schutzsymbol, wobei seine Hand sichtbar zittert.{/n} "Beschirmt uns, o Maschinengott, von dem Bösen, das von Eurem Tempel Besitz ergriffen hat. Rettet uns, bewahrt uns vor der Korruption, zeigt uns den Weg ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest blesses himself with a protective symbol, his hand visibly shaking.{/n} "Shield us, O Machine God, from the evil that has taken hold of your temple. Save us, preserve us from the corruption, show us the way..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Techpriester segnet sich selbst mit einem Schutzsymbol, wobei seine Hand sichtbar zittert.{/n} "Beschirmt uns, o Maschinengott, von dem Bösen, das von Eurem Tempel Besitz ergriffen hat. Rettet uns, bewahrt uns vor der Korruption, zeigt uns den Weg ..."

languages.text: {n}Le technoprêtre lève une main tremblante et esquisse un symbole de protection.{/n} « Ô Dieu-Machine, préserve-nous du mal impie qui a pris possession de ton temple. Sauve-nous, protège-nous de la corruption et guide-nous sur le droit chemin... »
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest blesses himself with a protective symbol, his hand visibly shaking.{/n} "Shield us, O Machine God, from the evil that has taken hold of your temple. Save us, preserve us from the corruption, show us the way..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le technoprêtre lève une main tremblante et esquisse un symbole de protection.{/n} « Ô Dieu-Machine, préserve-nous du mal impie qui a pris possession de ton temple. Sauve-nous, protège-nous de la corruption et guide-nous sur le droit chemin... »

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip, koruyucu bir sembolle kendini kutsuyor. Elleri tir tir titriyor.{/n} "Ey Makine Tanrı, tapınağını işgal eden şerden sana sığınırız. Bizi muhafaza et, yozluktan koru, bize yolu göster..."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest blesses himself with a protective symbol, his hand visibly shaking.{/n} "Shield us, O Machine God, from the evil that has taken hold of your temple. Save us, preserve us from the corruption, show us the way..."
